Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: At the end of title III of division A, insert the following:    SEC.___. STREETCAR FUNDING PROHIBITION.    Notwithstanding any other provision of law, Federal financial assistance may not be provided for any project or activity to establish, maintain, operate, or otherwise support a streetcar service. This section does not apply to a contract entered into before the date of enactment of this Act.
purpose: An amendment No. 17 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to prohibit Federal financial assistance to establish, maintain, operate, or otherwise support a streetcar service. Such prohibition would not apply to contracts entered into before the date of enactment of this Act.
